WHAT IS SEO? Search Engine Optimization (SEO) is the art of increasing a web site’s traffic, ever-increasing ROI by improving conversions, and simultaneously helping a page rank better in the search index results of searches for keywords (or keyword phrases) within the search query of an end-user.

THE SEARCH ENGINE OPTIMIZATION (SEO) OF WORDS

WHAT IS A WORD? A word is the linguistic morphology of sound and expression. It a symbol of cognitive forms in a language that denotes contextual meaning and ideas.

Your website is a word. It is also a function of how that word performs.

#1 SEO RULE FOR WEBMASTERS & SITE OWNERS

SEO Rule #1 - there are as many search engine optimization (SEO) strategies as there r words to market brand the keyword landscape.

SEO is more than a verb. It is more than the mere chaos and manipulation of finding words, then studying relational taxonomy or Dewey Decimal-like systemic classifications. SEO is not just categorization, relational algorithms and semantic organizational knowledge printed, cached to memory and indexed to only be found again on the World Wide Web.

Search Engine Optimization is the act of bettering your website content’s Search Engine Index (or Web Indexing) using Natural language processing, Semantic Web, PageRank Technology, Backlinks, Hypertext-Matching Analysis, Anchor text, Mathematical Algorithms, Artificial Intelligence, Neural Network (NN), Behavioral Marketing, Linguistics and so much more.

Through the study of your website, we can actively optimize search engine friendly web site structure, develop more effective class definitions, creatively enhance keyword placement, and write advantageous and concise copywriting, in order to optimize site performance and architect search index designs which help to generate a desired searchability and output by your end-users keyword (or keyword phrase) input query.
